fields.name: Closed_Survey
fields.fieldText:
Our Common Experience Survey is now closed


If you have any questions or would like to give us feedback, you can always use the Contact form to get in touch with our team.

fields.name: Details
fields.fieldText: Thank you for your feedback! If you'd like to share your experience with {!Brand}, you can leave us a review here.

fields.name: Already_Responded_Text
fields.fieldText: Thank you for filling out our {!Brand} Experience Survey! Your response helps us continue to improve. Our team will get in touch with you directly if you have won the $200 Visa gift card.

fields.name: thankYouDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Thanks, we really appreciate your feedback.
